name: sted
modName: A Small Tribute to Essi Daven
description:
This quest is intended to be an epilogue to the book novel 'A Little Sacrifice' which has also inspired the Netflix animated 'Sirens of the Deep' (even if the animated story epilogue is not what it should be) and is a link between the books and the games in terms of Essi Daven's story.

You'll find your own epilogue to the story of Little-Eye and Geralt.

Nota: The quest lasts around 1 hour, and contains several epilogues and paths depending on your choices in the game.
An option included in the mod allows you to test the different quest paths, without impacting your current game.

Remark: Native language of the Mod is French. English and Russian translations are also accurate. For the other languages, it will probably be weird sometimes.
